## Browser.newPage() method

Promise which resolves to a new [Page](./puppeteer.page.md) object. The Page is created in a default browser context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
newPage(): Promise<Page>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Page](./puppeteer.page.md)&gt;
